document.full_text: catcher j.p. arencibia smashed two homers and drove in five runs to lead the big-hitting toronto blue jays to a ruthless season-opening 13-3 rout of the minnesota twins on friday.
document.title: booming bats power blue jays to win over twins
lines_and_colors: catcher j.p. arencibia smashed two homers and drove in five runs to lead the big-hitting toronto blue jays to a ruthless season-opening 13-3 rout of the minnesota twins on friday.
